title: Krimble.Day1.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
hey emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
hello, krimble

title: Krimble.Day1.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Evening, Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Hey
Krimble how'd you get your name?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Oh? it's my Aunt's old name
Supposadly it's an old word for river

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
River, huh
do you like it

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
I think it suits me

title: Krimble.Dialog.Resolve
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Is there something else you want to talk about?
<<if $escape_active is true>>
[[Yeah I'm trying to escape|Krimble.AddToEscapeQuest]]
<<endif>>
[[Not really...|Krimble.EndDialog]]

title: Krimble.Day2.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Hey Krimble

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
You can call me Krim, it's fine

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
ok...Krim

title: Krimble.Day2.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
So Krim, were you owned by anyone else before coming here?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
No, this is all I've ever known
I've been talking to others and they worked as like, servants or whatever
I can't help but feel like it didn't have to be this bad

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
yeah, same

title: Krimble.Day3.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Hey Krim

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Hey Emma

title: Krimble.Day3.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Got anything to say 

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Nah not really

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Ok

title: Krimble.Day4.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Morning Krim

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Emma...hello

title: Krimble.Day4.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
So, what did you do, uh, before this?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
my family grew crops, I guess we didn't make enough money

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
We kept bees
I guess that didn't make enough money either

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
what's that like?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
bees are actually pretty friendly and if you take care of them, they'll return the favor
they just couldn't make enough honey for us
and...well

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
yeah

title: Krimble.Day5.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Hey Krim

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Hey Emma
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day5.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
I'm so tired Krim
They don't let us sleep enough

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Yeah, I don't think I'm going to make it through the winter

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
what do you mean?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
I heard some of the old timers talking
the one's who've been here a while, i mean
they say a lot of folks don't make it through the winter

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
oh, oh no

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
yeah
what about you, can you handle a winter

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
I don't know
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day6.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Hi emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Hi Krim

[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day6.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Krim do you have dreams?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Dreams? Like sleeping dreams or dreams of some kind of future
because I have none of the latter

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
I meant like sleeping dreams
since I came here they've become really vivid

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Hm, I haven't noticed
Mostly it's just blank
...
I did have a dream I was home though

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Home?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Yeah, a small town in the Coastland, right on the water
I hate waking up from those kinds of dreams

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
because you're back here?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Yeah
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day7.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Hi Krim, any dreams?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
No not really
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day7.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Hey emma, want to hear a joke?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
What? A Joke?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
well...
I got nothing

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
... Is that the joke?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
yes

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
hah aha
funny
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day8.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Morning Krim

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Hey emma, any dreams?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
*sigh*

[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day8.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
I had another dream about home

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
You did?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Yeah. I'm going through the beehives and checking all of them
the harvest is going to be good, from the looks of it
Then I go up the hill to look at the ocean
and I feel the breeze across my face
I felt so many memories come flooding back

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
...

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Then I woke up
It feels like my brain is pulling a cruel trick on me

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
I don't know, I get them sometimes
it beats the waking world

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
I guess
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day9.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Good morning Krim

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Good morning emma
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day9.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
What are you thinking about Emma

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Winter, and about what you said
I'm not sure I can make it day to day
much less, you know, longer that

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Yeah, it's hard to think even a day or two ahead
it's like we're in some kind of machine
no tomorrow or yesterday

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
yeah
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day10.Morning.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Hi Krim

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Hi Emma
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.Day10.Evening.Start
body:
<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Thinking about anything Emma?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
No not really

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
Still worried about winter?

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Yeah

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_silent>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_talking>>
If we're still alive by then, I'll watch out for you

<<setRightPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer emma_default_talking>>
<<setLeftPortrait DialogAndPortraitContainer krimble_default_silent>>
Me too Krimble
Thanks
[[....|Krimble.Dialog.Resolve]]

title: Krimble.AddToEscapeQuest
body:
<<addNPCToEscape CampAreaSecretEscape Krimble>>
If you can get us out of here, i'll try to help

title: Krimble.EndDialog
body: *sigh*
